name: How do I use a gun?
desc:
You got a small Pistol from Henry but he didn't mention on how to properly use it.
Ask him about that so You can confidently go in Your first mission.
short: Ask Henry on how to use a gun

dialog.answer: Y-you have to s-select a weapon with <MOUSE_WHEEL> f-first.

Aaand then I can shoot?.answer: N-no! Y-you have to aim f-first with <MOUSE_RIGHT> or else Y-you don't know where to s-shoot.

And how do I reload?.answer:
When Y-your ammo runs out in the bottom left corner, Y-you can press <R> ro reload Y-your gun.
Try hitting some of the d-dummies accross.
